title: Cut Out Sugar Cookies with Royal Icing
instructions: Whisk flour, baking powder, and salt together. Beat butter and sugar until fluffy. Add egg, milk, and vanilla. Gradually add flour mixture. Refrigerate 1 hour. Roll to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut with cookie cutters. Bake 8-10 minutes. For icing: Beat powdered sugar, meringue powder, and water until stiff peaks form. Tint with food coloring as desired.
